Dogs and Cats Allowed:
We welcome a two-pet maximum per apartment, not to exceed 65lbs total weight for one dog. Some breeds are prohibited and all pets are subject to the approval of management. Please call our leasing office for more details.

Description: Living at The Elms at Clarksburg Village Encore, an Active Adult community, means having exceptional comforts and conveniences right at hand, all in a desirable master-planned community. There is no need to worry about all that goes along with home ownership and maintenance. Now you can relax by the pool, enjoy a morning workout in the yoga studio, meet new friends at social gatherings, and even walk to a Harris Teeter and local restaurants. Best of all, you will have a spacious apartment home complemented by the attentive service that has made Legend Management Group one of the most distinguished property management companies in the nation. Please Call for an Appointment Today

Monthly Fees:
* Unassigned Garage Parking: $200
* Cat Rent: $40
* Dog Rent: $40
One Time Fees:
* Admin Fee: $200
* Application Fee: $35
* Cat Deposit: $500
* Dog Deposit: $500
Pet Policy:
Dogs and Cats Allowed:
We welcome 2 pets maximum per apartment, not to exceed 65 lbs. total weight of one dog. Some breeds are prohibited and all pets are subject to the approval of management. Specifics regarding your pet's breed, weight, proof of rabies documentation from your veterinarian and a photo of your pet will be required prior to move-in. A pet deposit of $500 is due upon move-in. A monthly pet rent of $40 per pet will be due at the beginning of each month. A security deposit of $500 is due upon move in. There is a weight limit of 50 pounds full grown, dogs over 35 pounds are on the ground floor only. Breed restrictions apply. 
* $500 Deposit
* $40 Monthly Pet Rent
* 65 lb Weight Limit
* 2 Pet Limit

Description: Enjoy signature suburban living in an upper Montgomery County location. Premium amenities and features create an ideal atmosphere for this Clarksburg luxury apartment residence. Just minutes from I-270 and the MARC train, residents enjoy a quick and convenient commute traveling throughout the metropolitan area. The finest apartments Clarksburg MD has to offer are yours at The Elms. Please call for an appointment today.

Description: Beautiful brick front end unit townhome in Clarksburg! Featuring 4BR/3.5BA and a 2 car garage. LL with BR and full BA. Bright and open ML with HW floors large LR and eat-in kitchen. Huge deck off kitchen overlooking trees perfect for entertaining. MBR with vaulted ceiling w/in closet and ensuite with soaking tub and double sink. Enjoy the park right out front! Minutes to I-270!

Description: AMAZING 3 BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE IN THE HEART OF CLARKSBURG. 3 LEVELS. MASTER SUITE. UPDATED KITCHEN WITH GRANITE COUNTERTOPS AND STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES. 2 CAR GARAGE. LARGE DECK. FLEXIBLE MOVE IN DATE.
